attributes.action: Demolish Law that Catholic can not be Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Catholics are not permitted to become Prime Minister, even though it is estimated there is more than four million in the UK. It is plain discrimination and should not be allowed in a country that boast freedom and equal rights.

rejection.details: No such law exists.  You may be thinking of the Act of Settlement, which relates to the Monarchy, not the PM.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
